title: Robotech: the Macross saga. 6. Final conflict [DVD]

abstract: Khyron's revenge--Broken heart--A Rainy night--Private time--Season's greetings--To the stars
description: At the end of the twentieth century evidence of an advanced alien civilization emerges when an enormous spaceship crashes on earth. The United Earth government is formed to combat impending invasion and to research the advanced and dangerous alien technologies. In this American futuristic anime television series Rick, Ben, Max, and Lisa are four earthlings doing battle in cyber-space, whilst dealing with their complex romantic lives. This disc, entitled "Final conflict", contains six episodes from the "Macross Saga". "Khyron's revenge": Rick patrols the skies of earth's new civilisation on a constant vigil against alien attack. Khyron plans a fresh attack. "Broken heart": Khyron succeeds in capturing Minmay and Kyle, using them as a prop to gain control of the SDF-1. "A Rainy night": Claudia gives Lisa advice, recalling her doomed romance with an exceptional fighter pilot. "Private time": the Zentraedi forces gather in a fresh assault. Rick tries to sort out his emotions for Lisa and Minmay. "Season's greetings": Khron plans a surprise Christmas present for the citizens of Macross city. "To the stars": Khyron plans his ultimate revenge, threatening the future of all earth. Lisa faces a difficult choice.
